Project Lead the Way and College Credit

div.p: Kindergarten sreening will be rescheduled for a later. If you've registered a child for kindergarten at Glandorf Elementaty or Ottawa Elementary, you will be notified of the new date once it has been determined.Â
Schoology, Google, and other online services are experiencing a large amount of traffic. You may notice intermittent errors. Schoology Status Monitor:Â https://status.schoology.com
Students that are experiencing issues with coursework should reach out to their teachers. If you are experiencing technology issues, please contact the OG Helpdesk.Â

Ottawa Glandorf School District will be starting a meal program this coming Monday March 23rd. Any and all enrolled students at Glandorf Elementary, Ottawa Elementary and Ottawa Glandorf High School are qualified to receive free breakfast and lunch to be picked up on Mondays from 10 a.m.-11 a.m. in the back of Ottawa Elementary. 5 breakfast meals and 5 lunch meals are included.

Please email: cafeteria@ottawaglandorf.org with a count of children, allergies if any, and a contact number for any questions. Please keep in mind that allergies will be addressed but preferences can not be. Please sign up by Saturday March 21 to be able to receive meals on Monday.
Charter to Offer Free Access to Spectrum Broadband and Wi-Fi For 60 Days For New K-12 and College Student Households and More.

ul.li: Charter will offer free Spectrum broadband and Wi-Fi access for 60 days to households with K-12 and/or college students who do not already have a Spectrum broadband subscription and at any service level up to 100 Mbps. To enroll call 1-844-488-8395. Installation fees will be waived for new student households.

span.span: Starting 3/14/20, all extracurricular/cocurriclular activities & practices are canceled - practice resumes 5/4/20

div.p: Ottawa-Glandorf Local Schools is working diligently to continue learning through this state wide school closure.Â Assignments will be posted and submitted digitally through Schoology during this time. Teachers will communicate expectations of students and families by next Tuesday via email to parents. This will include online accounts and password information to assist you with access.

Families that do not have access to technology devices in their homes for students to complete assignments, should contact their building office on Monday to arrange device pick up. Final Forms information MUST be current and up-to-date by Monday to ensure we have correct email addresses and contact information.
